contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Nakayama'''|中山町|Nakayama-chō}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Iyo District, Ehime|Iyo District]], [[Ehime Prefecture|Ehime]], [[Japan]]. On April 1, 2005 Nakayama, along with the town of [[Futami, Ehime|Futami]], also from [[Iyo District, Ehime|Iyo District]], was merged into the expanded city of [[Iyo, Ehime|Iyo]]. As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 4,256 and a [[population density|density]] of 56.43 persons per km². The total area was 75.42 km². ==External links== *[http://www.city.iyo.ehime.jp/ Iyo official website] in Japanese [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Ehime Prefecture]] {{Ehime-geo-stub}}
